SectionBody.Text: A person may not make, publish, disseminate, advertise, circulate, or place before the public, or cause, directly or indirectly, to be made, published, disseminated, circulated, or placed before the public, in any print, television, or broadcast media, or in any circular, letter, pamphlet, or publication of any kind, a statement or announcement that uses the existence of the Florida Workers’ Compensation Insurance Guaranty Association, Incorporated, to induce an employer to purchase membership in or insurance from a member insurer.
